рдХрд╛рдЮреНрдЪреА релрем рдЬрдЧрджреНрдЧреБрд░реБ рд╢реНрд░реА-рд╕рд░реНрд╡рдЬреНрдЮ рд╕рджрд╛рд╢рд┐рд╡ рдмреЛрдзреЗрдиреНрджреНрд░ рд╕рд░рд╕реНрд╡рддреА рдЖрд░рд╛рдзрдирд╛ #рекреорей

Observed on Kс╣Ыс╣гс╣Зa-Aс╣гс╣нam─л tithi of Caitraс╕е (lunar) month (Apar─Бhс╣Зaс╕е/vyaapti). The event occurred in 4640 (Kali era).
Then, the son of Cirutacikkad─Бdhvari on the banks of river Uttarapin─Бkin─л, a devotee of Hari, the preceptor Bodhe┼Ыvara, bearing the appellation Sad─Б┼Ыiva under the directions of preceptor Chandrac┼лс╕Нa, was Jagadguru for sixteen years adored by the King Prav─лra Sethupati. The preceptor visited the sacred Sethu R─Бme┼Ыvara, having worshipped Lord ┼Ъiva for the welfare of the mankind reached eternal abode on Caitra ┼Ъukla Aс╣гс╣нam─л in the year Vilambi. This preceptor is well-known as Sad─Б┼Ыiva Bodhe┼Ыvara, author of Puс╣Зya┼Ыlokama├▒jar─л and attained siddhi in R─Бme┼Ыvaram.

рдХрд╛рдЮреНрдЪреА рез рдЬрдЧрджреНрдЧреБрд░реБ рд╢реНрд░реА-рдЖрджрд┐-рд╢рдЩреНрдХрд░ рднрдЧрд╡рддреНрдкрд╛рдж рдЖрд░рд╛рдзрдирд╛ #реирекрепрен

Observed on ┼Ъukla-Ek─Бda┼Ы─л tithi of Vс╣Ыс╣гabhaс╕е (sidereal solar) month (Apar─Бhс╣Зaс╕е/vyaapti). The event occurred in 2626 (Kali era).
Born as an aс╣Б┼Ыa of Lord Mahe┼Ыa (┼Ъiva), the sweet or lucid instructor of the principles of non-dualism, the Sun in dispelling the dense darkness (the great delusion), the preceptor of the six cults, merged in Supreme in the thirty-second year of his life span, in the Kali era 2625 on the eleventh day of the bright fortnight in the month of Vс╣Ыс╣гabha of the year Rakt─Бkс╣гi. This venerable ┼Ъri ┼Ъaс╣Еkar─Бbhagavatp─Бda established the Advaita school everywhere after winning over the scholars (of rival schools) through commentarial works on Brahmas┼лtra etc. His native is Kerala; belonged to Namp┼лthiri group; father was ┼Ъivaguru, mother ─Аry─Бmb─Б, preceptor - ┼Ъri Govindabhagavatp─Бda, life span - 32 years; realisation - on the eleventh day of the bright fortnight of the month Vс╣Ыс╣гabha in the year Rakt─Бkс╣гi of Kali era - 2625 in K─Б├▒ci itself.

рдЖрджрд┐рддреНрдпрд╣рд╕реНрдд-рдкреБрдгреНрдпрдХрд╛рд▓рдГ

  • тЖТ12:11

When Hasta nakshatra falls on a Sunday, it is a special puс╣Зyak─Бlaс╕е. When Rohini nakshatra falls on a Saturday, it is a special puс╣Зyak─Бlaс╕е. In the cyclic rotation of time, along with the bad combinations of grahas and nakshatras that indicate the probability of upcoming difficulties, good combinations that grant benefits in multiples also arise. Among such good combinations are the Amrita Siddhi yogas of certain weekdays and nakshatras. They are Sunday-Hasta, Monday-Mrigashirsha, Tuesday-Ashvini, Wednesday-Anuradha, Thursday-Pushya, Friday-Revati, Saturday-Rohini. Good deeds performed on such yogas become especially strong in protecting and nourishing us. For instance, in Devi Atharvashirsha, it is said bhaum─Б┼Ыviny─Бс╣Г mah─Бd├кv─л-sannidhau japtv─Б mah─Бmс╣Ыtyuс╣Г tarati, that is, one can cross even mah─Бmс╣Ыtyu by doing parayanam when Tuesday and Ashvini join.

Observed on ┼Ъukla-Caturda┼Ы─л tithi of Vai┼Ы─Бkhaс╕е (lunar) month (Apar─Бhс╣Зaс╕е/vyaapti). The event occurred in 3974 (Kali era).
Son of Kamale┼Ыvara ┼Ъr─лpati, having received the initiation from ┼Ъaс╣Еkara, the sage (preceptor) with an ability to endure heat and cold easily, remained in the guru P─лс╣нha. Adorned by the erudites like ─Аnandavardhana etc., residing at Padmapuram for a long time and then, having reached K─Б├▒ci, He attained siddhi on the night of Narasimha Jayanti in the year Nandana. This saint Saccidvil─Бsa, adored by ┼Ъr─л ─Аnandavardhana, Mukt─Бkaс╣Зa, ┼Ъivasw─Бmi and R─Бj─Бnakaratn─Бkara remained in the P─лс╣нha for thirty-three years and attained siddhi near K─Б├▒ci on the full moon day of Vai┼Ы─Бka month in the year Nandana.

jagadguru ┼Ыr─л~┼Ыaс╣Еkara vijayendra sarasvat─л was inducted into the k─Бmakoс╣нi-p─лс╣нham on 29th May 1983, rudhirodg─Бr─л year, vс╣Ыс╣гabha/vai┼Ы─Бkha m─Бsa kс╣Ыс╣гс╣Зa tс╣Ыt─лy─Б bh─Бnuv─Бsaraс╕е m┼лl─Б nakс╣гatram.

When Shravana nakshatra falls on a Monday, it is a special puс╣Зyak─Бlaс╕е. When Rohini nakshatra falls on a Saturday, it is a special puс╣Зyak─Бlaс╕е. In the cyclic rotation of time, along with the bad combinations of grahas and nakshatras that indicate the probability of upcoming difficulties, good combinations that grant benefits in multiples also arise. Among such good combinations are the Amrita Siddhi yogas of certain weekdays and nakshatras. They are Sunday-Hasta, Monday-Mrigashirsha, Tuesday-Ashvini, Wednesday-Anuradha, Thursday-Pushya, Friday-Revati, Saturday-Rohini. Good deeds performed on such yogas become especially strong in protecting and nourishing us. For instance, in Devi Atharvashirsha, it is said bhaum─Б┼Ыviny─Бс╣Г mah─Бd├кv─л-sannidhau japtv─Б mah─Бmс╣Ыtyuс╣Г tarati, that is, one can cross even mah─Бmс╣Ыtyu by doing parayanam when Tuesday and Ashvini join.
